mapper.select: select v.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_vin, v.vehicle_mmy, v.vehicle_status from vehicle v where v.customer_id = #{customerId};
select v.vehicle_vin, v.vehicle_mmy, v.vehicle_status, v.customer_id from vehicle v where v.vehicle_id = #{vehicleId};
select v.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_vin, v.vehicle_mmy, v.vehicle_status from vehicle v left join vehicle_policy vp on v.vehicle_id = vp.vehicle_id where vp.policy_id=#{policyId};
